tool_description: Creates and tracks device fingerprints to identify known and unknown devices accessing customer accounts.

device_metadata.description: Array of device metadata strings (user agent, screen resolution, etc.)

create_new_fingerprint.description: Whether to create a new fingerprint for unknown devices

error_messages: Invalid account_id: Account must exist in the system.
Invalid device_metadata: Must be non-empty array of metadata strings.
Invalid ip_address: Must be a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address format.
Invalid session_id: Session ID must be a non-empty string.
Device fingerprinting failed: Unable to generate stable fingerprint from provided metadata.
usage: Provide account_id, device_metadata array, ip_address, and session_id. The tool will match against known devices or create new fingerprints as configured.

device_fingerprint_id.description: Unique identifier for the device fingerprint

is_known_device.description: Whether this device has been seen before for this account

first_seen_date.description: First time this device was seen (ISO 8601 format)

last_seen_date.description: Last time this device was seen (ISO 8601 format)
